mapper.sql: e.id AS e_id, e.turn_num AS e_turn_num, e.type AS e_type, e.start_dttm AS e_start_dttm, e.end_dttm AS e_end_dttm, e.status AS e_status, e.reg_dttm AS e_reg_dttm, e.up_dttm AS e_up_dttm
mapper.select: SELECT turn_num FROM EXECUTION_RULE WHERE `type` = 'CANDIDATE' AND start_dttm <= NOW() AND end_dttm >= NOW()
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EXECUTION_RULE (turn_num, `type`, `start_dttm`, `end_dttm`, `status`, `reg_dttm`,`up_dttm`) VALUES (#{turnNum}, #{type}, #{startDttm}, #{end_dttm}, 'REDAY', NOW(), NOW())
